notesStmt.note: Dry mould and/or salt accretions. Edge damage and tears. Sewing split in a number of places. Cracking/delamination at folds. Worming and insect damage. Bird excreta. Possible rodent urine contamination. Slight water damage.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
